        public void start()
        Begins the game by setting up a timer that calls tick() 60 times per second.

      • tick

        public void tick()
        tick() performs one iteration of the game, and notifies observers to draw a frame. This should be called 60 times per second by default.

        public boolean isCollision()
        Determines if there is a collision between the player and obstacles. The floor is ignored here.
        Returns:

      • bringToFloor

        public void bringToFloor()

        Returns:

        Returns:

      • checkForDeath

        public void checkForDeath()
        Checks whether there is a collision between the character and a block of lava. This will then set variables to end the game.

      • isGameOver

        public boolean isGameOver()
